statements: SELECT product_name, sale_price FROM product_sales_seasonality WHERE quantity_sold > 100 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM product_sales_seasonality WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, quantity_sold FROM product_sales_seasonality ORDER BY quantity_sold ASC, sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, sale_date FROM product_sales_seasonality WHERE product_id IN (2, 3) ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT sale_date, quantity_sold FROM product_sales_seasonality WHERE sale_price < 100.00 ORDER BY sale_date DESC, quantity_sold DESC;
SELECT * FROM product_sales_seasonality WHERE sale_price > 100 ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT product_name, quantity_sold FROM product_sales_seasonality WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT product_id, sale_price FROM product_sales_seasonality WHERE quantity_sold > 100 ORDER BY sale_price ASC
SELECT product_name, quantity_sold FROM product_sales_seasonality WHERE product_id = 5
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity_sold, sale_date FROM product_sales_seasonality WHERE sale_price < 50
SELECT product_id, product_name, sales_quantity, sales_date FROM ProductSales;
SELECT product_name, sales_date, sales_quantity, product_id FROM ProductSales;
SELECT * FROM InventoryStock;
SELECT stock_quantity, product_id, stock_date FROM InventoryStock;
SELECT product_name, sales_quantity FROM ProductSales;
SELECT * FROM ProductSales WHERE sales_quantity > 100 ORDER BY sales_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, sales_quantity, sales_date FROM ProductSales WHERE sales_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY sales_date;
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity, stock_date FROM InventoryStock JOIN ProductSales ON InventoryStock.product_id = ProductSales.product_id WHERE stock_quantity < 50 ORDER BY stock_date;

SELECT product_name, sales_date, stock_date FROM ProductSales JOIN InventoryStock ON ProductSales.product_id = InventoryStock.product_id WHERE sales_quantity >= 200 OR stock_quantity >= 100 ORDER BY sales_date, stock_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_products, SUM(sales_quantity) AS total_sales FROM ProductSales WHERE sales_quantity > 0 GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_sales > 500 ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProductSales ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, sale_quantity, unit_price FROM ProductSales WHERE product_id = 5;
SELECT trend_description FROM SeasonalTrends WHERE season_name = 'Summer';
SELECT product_name, sale_date FROM ProductSales WHERE unit_price > 50 ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE last_stocked_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT * FROM ProductSales ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM ProductSales WHERE sale_quantity > 1000;
SELECT product_id, SUM(sale_quantity) AS total_quantity_sold FROM ProductSales GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY total_quantity_sold DESC;
SELECT product_name, sale_quantity, unit_price FROM ProductSales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Inventory INNER JOIN ProductSales ON ProductSales.product_id = Inventory.product_id WHERE Inventory.quantity > 50;
SELECT * FROM product_sales;
SELECT product_id, quantity_sold FROM product_sales WHERE sale_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT season_name, peak_month FROM seasonal_trends ORDER BY average_sales DESC;
SELECT product_id, quantity_in_stock, last_updated FROM inventory_levels WHERE quantity_in_stock < 10;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity_ordered, order_date FROM restock_orders ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM product_sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC, revenue ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, quantity_sold FROM product_sales WHERE quantity_sold > 100 ORDER BY quantity_sold DESC;
SELECT season_name, peak_month FROM seasonal_trends ORDER BY average_sales DESC;
SELECT product_id, quantity_in_stock, TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, last_updated, CURDATE()) AS days_since_last_update FROM inventory_levels WHERE quantity_in_stock < 100 ORDER BY days_since_last_update ASC;
SELECT * FROM restock_orders JOIN product_sales ON restock_orders.product_id = product_sales.product_id WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY category ASC, price DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE quantity_sold >= 100 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT sale_id, product_id, sale_date FROM sales WHERE product_id = 3 AND quantity_sold < 50 ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE stock_quantity <= 20 ORDER BY stock_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM seasons WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT sales.sale_date, sales.quantity_sold, products.product_name FROM sales INNER JOIN products ON sales.product_id = products.product_id;

SELECT inventory.stock_quantity, inventory.stock_date, products.product_name, products.category FROM inventory INNER JOIN products ON inventory.product_id = products.product_id WHERE inventory.stock_quantity > 0;
SELECT seasons.* FROM seasons WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
